name: LCD Games: Santa Saves Christmas
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: this game requires Apple Watch!

In Lapland, an abominable snowman has broken into the great elf factory and is wreaking havoc amongst the elves. Now it's up to Santa to load the presents on the sleigh and save Christmas!

Santa Saves Christmas is a frantically paced Apple Watch game in the style of a classic LCD handheld game from the 1980's. Use the digital crown to move Santa. Collect presents from the chute on the left, and deliver them to the suction tube for loading. Avoid elves thrown by the furious Yeti and the electrified fairy lights.

Includes two game modes, GAME A for beginners and GAME B to skip straight to the action for advanced players.

Compare scores and challenge friends via Game Center using the iPhone app.
